channel.title: Shops
channel.description:
Well, I need to know how to add shops, and then add items to the shops? Because i am making a new home area; and I need npc's then, to add items to shop?
Also, how to change the price of items?

item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @sharecode sharecode
item.description:
@sharecode wrote:

find a folder that says ShopMaker something like that and find the coordinates you want to place the npc with the items at.
then type in the X Coordinates And The Y Coordinates.
Name the shop and do some description type in the item id such as
Dragon-Claws=Id: 8002
Pickup Coder: 08002

and type in the price you want it to be.

to edit what npc shops say and items go to shophandler and npc handler

hope this helps
rep plz

Read full topic
